title: Age of Conan - PvP Weekend Event Client
description:
You must have a pvp beta key for this client to work.
Event: April 18 - April 21st.

(http://www.ageofconan.com/)


So far, not off to a good start. 

Somehow the idiots at gamespot are the ones handling the client files, forcing you to go through either a torrent with no seeders or use their piece of shit &#039;download manager&#039; that errors out everytime - on their terrible bandwidth.

For an event that&#039;s only 3 days, gamespot really dropped the ball on this one. Hopefully decisions like this aren&#039;t a foreshadowing of things to come from AoC.




Seed 1:1 - or ban.
